sense.gloss: to put on the market, to put out for sale, to put on sale, to begin selling, to market

sdata.j: クリスマスは↑新↑↓あたら↓しいおもちゃを↑売↑↓|う↓り↑出↑↓だ↓す|いい↑機会↑↓きかい↓だ。
sdata.e: Christmas is a good time to market new toys.

sdata.j: ↑静↑↓しず↓かにしていろ。さもないとここから↑放↑↓ほ|う↓り↑出↑↓だ↓す|ぞ。
sdata.e: Keep silent, or I will throw you out of here.
